subject: Order
description_text:
Hi do you have Simsonn Plus X 3-Pedal Set stock in European Warehouse?
Im from Germany and need it

Mfg

conversations.body_text: The German warehouse has received the shipment today. Feel free to place your order.

Thx for the Info Order placed ?
Please Ship fast and Merry Christmas
________________________________

Hey i have placed my order and you have telled me that when i order over
the Website you ship also from German Warehouse. But the Pedals are Shipped
from China!
So i hope i dont need to pay extra taxes or anything.

Because that wouldn't be nice. I specifically asked whether it would be
shipped from the German warehouse.

Am Mo., 22. Dez. 2025 um 12:24 Uhr schrieb support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com>:

> The German warehouse has received the shipment today. Feel free to place
> your order.
> 8683:4206036
>
